title: What is the link between meditation and spirituality?
description: Answer (1 of 27): You are spirit, Meditation helps you to know that; Most people think they are the body, many more believe they are their minds, some believe I am only Human. You are the observer of all this, Pure Intelligence (spirit) Learn to Meditate and Be That.
